author: stephenc
msg: o Needed to refactor how exceptions thrown by scripts are handled.  Previously exceptions were considered as failures.  Now exceptions in the scripts are considered as errors. This is consistent with how JUnit considers exceptions in the setUp/tearDown methods of a test.
